author: chayanit
body:
#### PR description:

Update GEN-SIM strings for Relval 106X

#### PR validation:

All the strings are taken from relvals submission in 10_6_0 release and tested locally. These strings correspond to existing input datasets on DAS, for example
2016 FullSim
https://cmsweb.cern.ch/das/request?view=list&limit=50&instance=prod%2Fglobal&input=%2F*%2FCMSSW_10_6_0-106X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v3-v1%2FGEN-SIM
https://cmsweb.cern.ch/das/request?view=list&limit=50&instance=prod%2Fglobal&input=%2F*%2FCMSSW_10_6_0-PU25ns_106X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v3-v1%2FPREMIX*
2017 FullSim
https://cmsweb.cern.ch/das/request?view=list&limit=50&instance=prod%2Fglobal&input=%2F*%2FCMSSW_10_6_0-106X_mc2017_realistic_v3-v1%2FGEN-SIM
https://cmsweb.cern.ch/das/request?view=list&limit=50&instance=prod%2Fglobal&input=%2F*%2FCMSSW_10_6_0-PU25ns_106X_mc2017_realistic_v3-v1%2FPREMIX*
2018 FullSim
https://cmsweb.cern.ch/das/request?view=list&limit=50&instance=prod%2Fglobal&input=%2F*%2FCMSSW_10_6_0-106X_upgrade2018_realistic_v4-v1%2FGEN-SIM
https://cmsweb.cern.ch/das/request?view=list&limit=50&instance=prod%2Fglobal&input=%2F*%2FCMSSW_10_6_0-PU25ns_106X_upgrade2018_realistic_v4-v1%2FPREMIX*
title: Update GEN-SIM strings relval 106X
